scripts.pkg:prepare: npm run pkg:build && npm run pkg:pack && npm run pkg:move
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules && npm install cloudinary-url-gen.tgz && npm install
scripts.prepare:import: npm i -D cpy-cli && cpy ./package-import.json . --rename=package.json && npm run pkg:prepare && npm run clean-install
scripts.prepare:require: npm i -D cpy-cli && cpy ./package-require.json . --rename=package.json && npm run clean-install
scripts.test:require: npm run prepare:require && npm run clean-install && node ./testRequire.js
scripts.test: npm run test:import && npm run test:require
